professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator with expertise in SQL Server, data migration, disaster recovery, performance tuning, and high availability solutions. Proficient in various database administration tasks and technologies including VMWare, Azure, AWS, and ETL/SSIS processes.

key_responsibilities: 2014 across various platforms including Windows NT
Managed data center operations supporting over 120TB of data through partitioning
Performed database upgrades and migrations for SQL Server versions including 2005
Configured and maintained high-availability solutions including Always ON
and replication for SQL Server databases.
Enhanced database security through the creation of user-defined server roles in SQL Server 2008 and 2008R2 for clients.
Utilized the 'Partially contained database' feature to facilitate data migration and refresh operations.
